- Can’t decide on something? Create a poll for your contacts to help you out. You can now post polls to your groups and My World.
- Several fixes and enhancements for iOS 11.

- Sharing was updated so that when you share a post, it now gives credit to the original poster. You can share public posts and page posts. Soon you’ll be be able to share open group posts.

- The new sharing just keeps getting better and better. You can now share posts inside our open groups and optionally inside selective groups. Private group posts will always stay private with no way to share them.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- Dark Theme is now available in the MeWe store. Go give it a try!
- Scan QR codes saved to your photo gallery.
- Four new languages added: Polish, Italian, Hebrew and Dutch.

Dual-camera videos (MeWe’s®) are here!

MeWe’s® allow you to film and share videos using your phone's outward-facing camera, while simultaneously filming yourself using your phone's "selfie" camera. With MeWe’s®, the camera is watching you talking (

Organize your favorite stories and keep them visible on your profile. Choose who can view your Journals by adjusting your privacy settings. You can quickly find stories by the date they were created.
